plot: Recently released from a Latin American prison, Alistair is confronted by a mysterious woman challenging the perceptions of his new life and his past. Can you trust the one who meets you, when you are alone and lost?
title: El Caballero
plot_es: Recently released from a Latin American prison, Alistair is confronted by a mysterious woman challenging the perceptions of his new life and his past. Can you trust the one who meets you, when you are alone and lost?
plot_en: Recently released from a Latin American prison, Alistair is confronted by a mysterious woman challenging the perceptions of his new life and his past. Can you trust the one who meets you, when you are alone and lost?
